name: Sea Of Souls: The Placeholder
description: This is a game made in the Unreal Engine 4 as a student during my last semester in the Fumec university located in Brazil, made to test some ideas and concepts I plan to use in future full pledged projects. Inspired in my favorite types of games, this game takes heavy influence out of Dark Souls, The Witcher, Sea Of Thieves, God Of War (2018) and many others of my favorite games.
